metadata.title: Get SaaS - Modern SaaS Template Designed for Global Markets
metadata.description: Get SaaS is a modern SaaS template designed for global markets, featuring complete user authentication, payment systems, multi-language support, and SEO optimization. Built with Next.js to help developers launch SaaS products quickly.

hero.title:
Modern SaaS Template for Global Markets
Launch Your SaaS Product Worldwide
hero.description: Get SaaS features complete user authentication, payment systems, multi-language support, and SEO optimization. Built with Next.js and modern tech stack, focus on your business logic and launch globally fast.

agents.title: Tailored AI Agent Services for Different Scenarios

contentSummaryAgent.title: Audio Content Summary Agent
contentSummaryAgent.description: Automatically recognizes timestamped audio content and generates structured summaries using advanced reasoning models, quickly extracting key points and essential information.

podcastAgent.title: AI Podcast Agent
podcastAgent.description: Professional podcast production agent that automatically generates scripts, hosts conversations, and features human-like voice synthesis to help you create high-quality podcast shows effortlessly.

voiceAgent.title: AI Voice Agent
voiceAgent.description: Intelligent voice-over service that generates professional voice-overs comparable to humans from text input. Multiple voice options, rich emotions, perfectly suited for all types of content.

videoAgent.title: AI Video Agent
videoAgent.description: One-stop video production agent, fully automated from script to finished video. Combines AI-generated content, voice-overs, and footage to quickly produce professional short videos.

features.title: Modern SaaS Template, Complete Solution for Global Products

contentSummaryAgent.title: User Authentication System
contentSummaryAgent.description: Integrated complete user registration, login, password reset functions, supports multiple authentication methods, ensuring user data security.

podcastAgent.title: Payment System Integration
podcastAgent.description: Built-in Stripe payment system, supports subscription billing, one-time payments, invoice management, and enterprise-grade security features.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Get SaaS Template

howToStart.question: How do I get started with Get SaaS template?
howToStart.answer: Very simple! After purchasing the template, you'll get complete source code and documentation. Follow our setup guide to configure the database, environment variables, and deploy to your preferred platform. No complex configuration required, ready to use immediately.

voiceQuality.question: What technologies does Get SaaS template use?
voiceQuality.answer: Get SaaS is built with modern technology stack: Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, PostgreSQL database, NextAuth.js authentication, Stripe payment system, and next-intl for internationalization. All technologies are industry-leading and production-ready.

contentOwnership.question: Can I use Get SaaS template for commercial projects?
contentOwnership.answer: Absolutely! After purchasing Get SaaS template, you have full commercial usage rights. You can use it to build and sell SaaS products, modify the code, and even resell the final products without any restrictions.

dataPrivacy.question: Does Get SaaS template include data security features?
dataPrivacy.answer: Yes, Get SaaS includes comprehensive security features: encrypted user authentication, secure payment processing, data validation, CSRF protection, and follows security best practices. All user data is properly protected.

pointsExpiry.question: How long is the Get SaaS template license valid?
pointsExpiry.answer: Get SaaS template license is permanent. Once purchased, you can use it indefinitely, including all future updates and improvements. No recurring fees or subscription required.

upgradeAnytime.question: Can I upgrade my SaaS template plan anytime?
upgradeAnytime.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade to a higher version of the SaaS template anytime. After upgrading, you'll immediately get new features and extended technical support, while your existing license remains valid.

enterpriseFeatures.question: What special features does Enterprise SaaS template include?
enterpriseFeatures.answer: Enterprise version provides custom development services, private deployment support, 24/7 technical support, team training and consulting, plus dedicated customer success manager services. Completely tailored solutions according to your business needs.

footer.description: Modern SaaS template designed for global markets, featuring complete user authentication, payment systems, multi-language support, helping you quickly launch global SaaS products.

metadata.title: TranslateGemma - Open Source AI Translation | Google DeepMind
metadata.description: TranslateGemma is Google DeepMind's latest open-source translation model released in January 2026, supporting 55 languages, 500+ language pairs, offline usage and private deployment.
metadata.keywords: translategemma, AI translation, open source translation, offline translation, Google DeepMind, multi-language translation, private deployment, Gemma 3, machine translation

hero.title: Global Translation, Local Control
hero.subtitle: Google DeepMind January 2026 Release | 12B Parameters Outperform 27B Baseline | Support 55 Languages 500+ Language Pairs | Fully Open Source with Private Deployment

features.title: Why Choose TranslateGemma?
features.subtitle: Next-Generation Open Source AI Translation Solution

performance.title: Performance Doubled, Cost Halved
performance.description: 12B parameter version outperforms 27B baseline model with revolutionary 5:1 interleaved attention mechanism, reducing computational resource requirements by 50% while doubling translation speed.
performance.highlight3: ‚úÖ Lower hardware requirements for same performance
performance.highlight4: ‚úÖ Long-text processing memory grows nearly linearly

languages.title: Global Languages, Precise Coverage
languages.description: Supporting 55 core languages and nearly 500 language pairs, from mainstream to low-resource languages. With 256k super-large vocabulary design, non-English language encoding efficiency increases 8x, low-resource language translation accuracy improves up to 30%.
languages.highlight1: ‚úÖ Mainstream languages: Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, French, German, Spanish, Russian, etc.
languages.highlight2: ‚úÖ Small languages: Icelandic, Welsh, Swahili, etc.
languages.highlight3: ‚úÖ Bidirectional translation: 500+ language pairs freely combined
languages.highlight4: ‚úÖ Terminology adaptation: Precise conversion of idioms, slang, and professional terms

multimodal.title: Photo Translation, No OCR Required
multimodal.description: Multimodal translation capability for unified image-text processing. TranslateGemma can directly translate text in images without cumbersome OCR preprocessing, whether it's road signs, menus, scanned documents or product packaging.
multimodal.highlight1: ‚úÖ Travel: Road signs, traffic signs, restaurant menus
multimodal.highlight2: ‚úÖ Office: Scanned documents, paper contracts, business cards

deployment.title: Flexible Deployment Across All Scenarios
deployment.description: Three versions from mobile to cloud, meeting all needs: 4B (mobile, ‚â§2GB), 12B (notebook, ‚â§18GB), 27B (cloud, enterprise-grade performance).
deployment.highlight1: üì± 4B Mobile Version: Smartphones, tablets, offline translation
deployment.highlight2: üíª 12B Notebook Version: Personal computers, high-precision translation
deployment.highlight4: ‚ö° Flexible quantization: Memory reduced by 30-50% with <3% performance loss

security.title: Data Security, Privacy Protected
security.description: Supporting fully offline use, all translation data stored locally, Google collects no information. Complies with GDPR, CCPA and other international privacy regulations, the best choice for handling sensitive documents (contracts, medical records, financial statements).
security.highlight1: ‚úÖ Fully offline operation, no network required
security.highlight2: ‚úÖ Local data storage, zero cloud transmission
security.highlight3: ‚úÖ Supports data encryption and access control
security.highlight4: ‚úÖ Complies with GDPR, HIPAA and other compliance requirements

opensource.title: Open Source Ecosystem, Free Customization
opensource.description: Based on Apache 2.0 open source license, developers can freely use, modify and distribute. Provides complete API interfaces and SDKs, supporting multiple programming languages like Python, Java, JavaScript, easily integrated into existing products.
opensource.highlight1: ‚úÖ Complete API documentation and code examples

mobile.title: Mobile Offline Photo Translation
mobile.description: Traveler checking Japanese menu in restaurant
mobile.highlight2: üì∏ Open camera to photograph Japanese menu
mobile.highlight3: ‚ö° Complete recognition and translation in 1 second
mobile.highlight4: üìñ Display Chinese translation including dish descriptions

desktop.title: Desktop Long Document Batch Translation
desktop.highlight4: üì• Export as Word/PDF format, preserving original layout

developer.title: Developer API Quick Integration
developer.description: Adding multi-language product descriptions to e-commerce website
developer.highlight2: üíª Complete API call in 10 lines of code
developer.highlight4: ‚úÖ Auto quality check and return translation results

official.title: Official Core Feature Overview
official.highlight1: üì± Mobile real-time earphone translation (preserving tone and intonation)

testimonials.title: Trusted by Users Worldwide
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of users experiencing the power of TranslateGemma

user1.name: Zhang Xiao
user1.title: Travel Blogger
user1.content: As someone who travels abroad frequently, TranslateGemma's offline translation feature is incredibly useful! When traveling in Iceland last year, many places had no network signal, but I could still use my phone to photograph and translate road signs and menus. The translation accuracy is very high, even Icelandic, a small language, can be accurately recognized. 5 stars!

user2.name: Li Ming
user2.title: Cross-border E-commerce CTO
user2.content: Our company is a cross-border e-commerce business that needs to translate a large number of product descriptions into 30+ languages every month. Previously using translation APIs, monthly costs exceeded $5000. After deploying TranslateGemma, costs dropped to $1500, and translation quality is better with more accurate professional terminology. Private deployment also makes our product strategy more secure.

user3.name: Wang Bo
user3.title: PhD Student in Computer Science
user3.content: As a PhD student, I need to read a large amount of English literature every week. TranslateGemma's long document translation feature allows me to quickly understand the core content of papers, especially with very accurate professional terminology translation. 128k Token support means I can translate entire papers at once without manual splitting. My literature reading efficiency has improved by at least 5 times!

user4.name: Director Liu
user4.title: International Department Director, Major Hospital
user4.content: Our hospital has a large number of international patients requiring medical record and prescription translation. TranslateGemma's private deployment perfectly solves our data security concerns. Medical terminology translation is accurate, supports custom medical vocabulary, and fully complies with HIPAA compliance requirements. Already implemented hospital-wide.

user5.name: Alex Chen
user5.title: Independent Developer
user5.content: As an independent developer, I need to add multi-language support to my SaaS product. TranslateGemma's API is very simple to use, completed integration in 10 minutes. And it's completely open source, I can customize as needed. Most importantly, the monthly 1 million character free quota makes my startup costs almost zero!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about TranslateGemma

q1.question: When will the iOS version be officially launched?
q1.answer:
Currently iOS only supports obtaining the test version through TestFlight. The official plans to promote the test version to App Store in 2026, specific time subject to Google AI official website announcement.

Temporary alternatives:
- iOS users can visit Google Translate web version through browser, indirectly using TranslateGemma's core translation features
- Or use desktop version on Mac devices

q2.question: Does mobile installation require root or jailbreak?
q2.answer:
No need.

- Android version: Download APK file directly, allow 'install from unknown sources' in settings to complete installation
- iOS test version: Install through TestFlight, no jailbreak required

Installation process is identical to regular apps, won't affect device warranty and security.

q3.question: Can different model versions be installed simultaneously?
q3.answer:
Yes.

- Mobile and desktop: 4B mobile version and 12B desktop version can be installed independently without conflict
- Developer deployment: Different parameter versions (4B/12B/27B) need to store weight files separately

Recommended approach: Use different directories for differentiation, specify corresponding path when loading.

q4.question: How to resume after download interruption?
q4.answer:
Supports resume from breakpoint.

Mobile:
- Re-enter download page, system automatically recognizes downloaded parts
- Supports resume from breakpoint, no need to re-download

Desktop / Developer:
- Python package installation: pip install supports auto-resume
- Docker deployment: Re-execute docker pull command
- Manual download: Use wget -c or curl -C - for resume support

q1.question: What image formats are supported for photo translation?
q1.answer:
Supports common image formats.

Supported formats:
- ‚úÖ JPG / JPEG
- ‚úÖ PNG
- ‚úÖ PDF scanned documents
- ‚úÖ WebP
- ‚úÖ BMP

Not currently supported:
- ‚ùå GIF animations
- ‚ùå Video files (MP4/AVI etc.)
- ‚ùå Dynamic content

q2.question: Does offline translation support all 55 core languages?
q2.answer:
Yes, but requires downloading language packs in advance.

Text translation:
- Supports all 55 languages offline
- Need to download corresponding language pack in advance (Settings ‚Üí Offline languages)
- Single language pack size ‚â§500MB

Voice translation:
- Offline support limited to 12 mainstream languages: Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, French, German, Spanish, Russian, Arabic, Portuguese, Italian, Dutch
- Low-resource languages offline only support text translation

q3.question: Can idioms, slang and other complex expressions be accurately translated?
q3.answer:
Yes. TranslateGemma performs 'context proofreading' through Gemini engine, avoiding word-for-word literal translation.

Real examples:
- English: 'stealing my thunder' ‚Üí Chinese 'Êä¢È£éÂ§¥' (not 'stealing my thunder')
- English: 'piece of cake' ‚Üí Chinese 'Â∞èËèú‰∏ÄÁ¢ü' (not 'a piece of cake')
- Chinese 'Âä†Ê≤π' ‚Üí 'Come on' / 'Keep up the good work' (context-dependent)
- Chinese 'ÁîªËõáÊ∑ªË∂≥' ‚Üí 'Gild the lily'

q4.question: What is the upper limit for long text translation?
q4.answer:
Depends on the model version used.

- 4B Mobile: 32k Token (approx 8,000 words), recommended single processing ‚â§5,000 words
- 12B Desktop: 128k Token (approx 30,000 words), recommended ‚â§30,000 words
- 27B Cloud: 128k Token (approx 30,000 words), supports whole document processing

For ultra-long documents, 12B version processing 50,000+ words recommended to split paragraphs. Supports Word/PDF format direct translation, preserving original formatting, images, tables.

q5.question: Does it support real-time earphone translation?
q5.answer:
Yes.

Feature characteristics:
- ‚úÖ Supports 70+ languages real-time translation
- ‚úÖ Preserves speaker tone and intonation
- ‚úÖ Compatible with any earphones (no dedicated device required)
- ‚úÖ Bidirectional translation

Current status:
- Android version: Test version launched
- iOS version: Planned for 2026 rollout

q1.question: Is Python 3.9 and below compatible?
q1.answer:
Not compatible.

Minimum requirements:
- Python 3.10+
- Recommended Python 3.11 or 3.12

Reason: TranslateGemma depends on underlying libraries (like transformers, torch) that require Python 3.10+ features.

q2.question: How much memory is required for Docker deployment?
q2.answer:
Memory requirements depend on model version.

Minimum configuration:
- 4B: RAM + VRAM total ‚â•6 GB, recommended 8 GB
- 12B: RAM + VRAM total ‚â•18 GB, recommended 24 GB
- 27B: RAM + VRAM total ‚â•54 GB, recommended 64 GB+

Port conflict resolution: If port 8080 is occupied, replace port when starting: docker run -p 8081:8080 translategemma:12b

q3.question: What hardware configuration is needed for model fine-tuning?
q3.answer:
Depends on fine-tuning scale and data volume.

Low-resource language fine-tuning (‚â•500 sentence pairs):
- 12B version: RTX 4090 / M3 Max GPU
- 27B version: Single H100 GPU

Enterprise-level custom fine-tuning: Recommend using distributed GPU deployment (2-4 A100/H100 cards), improving training efficiency and shortening fine-tuning cycle.

q4.question: How to resolve 'model loading VRAM overflow' issue?
q4.answer:
Use quantization or optimize loading method.

Solution 1: INT8 quantization (recommended)
- Memory usage from 24GB reduced to 12GB
- Speed increased by 30%
- Performance loss <3%

Solution 2: FP16 half precision
- Memory usage reduced by 50%
- Performance loss <1%

Solution 3: Reduce concurrency
- Avoid processing multiple long texts simultaneously
- Set batch_size=1
- Close other programs occupying GPU

q5.question: What programming languages support API calls?
q5.answer:
Native support for Python, Java, JavaScript; other languages through HTTP API.

Python (recommended), JavaScript/TypeScript, Java natively supported.

Other languages (through HTTP API): Start Docker container to provide HTTP API, use curl call (applicable to Go/C#/PHP/Ruby etc.)

q1.question: Is non-profit use completely free?
q1.answer:
Yes, completely free with no restrictions.

Non-profit scenarios include:
- ‚úÖ Personal learning, research
- ‚úÖ Public welfare projects, charitable organizations
- ‚úÖ Educational institution teaching use
- ‚úÖ Open source project development

No need to sign additional agreements, download and use directly.

q2.question: What are the charging rules for commercial use?
q2.answer:
Free quota + pay-as-you-go.

Free quota:
- Monthly translation volume ‚â§1 million characters (approx 500,000 Chinese characters) free

Excess charges:
- Excess portion charged at $0.001/character
- Unified settlement at end of month

Billing examples:
- Monthly translation 500,000 characters ‚Üí $0
- Monthly translation 2 million characters ‚Üí (2M - 1M) √ó $0.001 = $1000

q3.question: Is there an additional charge for private deployment?
q3.answer:
Private deployment itself has no additional charge.

Explanation:
- Private deployment belongs to deployment method, no additional charge
- But commercial use needs to follow billing rules (free quota still applies)
- Enterprise custom version can obtain exclusive deployment architecture design service (included in package)

q4.question: Can TranslateGemma be integrated into own products?
q4.answer:
Yes.

Requirements:
- ‚úÖ Open source license allows secondary development and product integration
- ‚úÖ Need to note 'Built on TranslateGemma' in product description
- ‚úÖ Follow Apache 2.0 open source license copyright requirements

Commercial products: If integrated into commercial products, need to follow commercial use billing rules

q1.question: Will translation data be collected by Google?
q1.answer:
Depends on usage method.

Local deployment / offline use:
- ‚úÖ Data only stored on local device
- ‚úÖ Google collects no information
- ‚úÖ 100% privacy protection

Online use (like web version, API calls):
- ‚ö†Ô∏è Data temporarily transmitted to Google servers for processing
- ‚úÖ Complies with GDPR compliance requirements
- ‚úÖ Not used for third-party sharing
- ‚úÖ Automatically deleted after processing complete

q2.question: How to ensure security when translating enterprise sensitive documents?
q2.answer:
Use private deployment + data encryption.

Security measures:
1. Private deployment: All translation data stored locally, not uploaded to cloud
2. Data encryption: Supports disk encryption, transmission encryption
3. Access control: IP whitelist, API key verification
4. Disable logs: Turn off automatic log upload function

Enterprise-level security (custom version):
- Complies with GDPR/HIPAA/SOC 2 compliance requirements
- Regular security audits
- Data backup and recovery
- Dedicated security consultant

q3.question: Does it support data export?
q3.answer:
Yes.

Supported formats:
- ‚úÖ TXT plain text
- ‚úÖ Word (.docx)
- ‚úÖ PDF
- ‚úÖ JSON (API calls)
- ‚úÖ CSV (batch translation)

Enterprise users can integrate with own storage systems through API: Alibaba Cloud OSS, AWS S3, Azure Blob Storage, private NAS

q1.question: What if low-resource language translation accuracy is low?
q1.answer:
Use fine-tuning + context correlation.

Solution 1: Upload custom corpus for fine-tuning (‚â•1000 sentence pairs)
Solution 2: Enable context correlation - Supplement scenario description when inputting text

Effect improvement:
- Accuracy improved by 15-30% after fine-tuning
- Terminology consistency improved by 40%+

q2.question: How to optimize desktop translation lag?
q2.answer:
Optimize resource usage + adjust settings.

Optimization recommendations:
1. Close background programs: Release GPU/CPU resources
2. Disable real-time preview: Settings ‚Üí Turn off 'real-time translation'
3. Use batch mode: Process entire document at once, not sentence by sentence
4. Enable quantization mode: Reduce memory usage

q3.question: How to improve batch translation efficiency?
q3.answer:
Use cloud version + API batch mode.

Enterprise users:
- Use 27B cloud version: Distributed processing, speed increased by 2x
- API batch mode: Submit 100 texts at once

Efficiency improvement:
- Batch mode 10x faster than sequential translation
- 27B version 2x faster than 12B version
- Parallel processing 5x faster than serial processing
